title: Textile, "Jack in the Pulpit", 1976
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by flat screen on plain weave, glazed and polished finish
markings: Printed on right side, "Jack  in the Pulpit" designed by Vera exclusively for Schumacher.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 283 x 140 cm (9 ft. 3 7/16 in. x 55 1/8 in.)
Repeat L: 65 cm (25 9/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of F. Schumacher and Co.
description: Multi layers of ferns and wild flowers featuring featuring the Jack in the Pulpit. Muted colors on a white background. Lengths of fabric placed side by side continue pattern. Original design dates to 1949.

tombstone.epitaph:

1976. Medium: cotton
